column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is the graphical server.
allows querying information about windows.
starts the graphical server.
provides the sans and serif fonts for LARBS.
is an extensive terminal file manager that everyone likes.
is for transparency and removing screen-tearing.
is a tool for detecting window properties.
allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems.
allows desktop notifications.
is a suckless notification system.
allows management of FAT drives.
is a minimalist image viewer.
sets the wallpaper.
can record and splice video and audio on the command line.
serves as the system keyring.
gives the dark GTK theme used in LARBS.
a tidier vim with some useful features
is to prevent neovim from opening new instances
is a lightweight music daemon.
is a terminal interface for mpd.
is the patrician's choice video player.
lets you read man pages of programs.
a ncurses interface for music with multiple formats and a powerful tag editor.
is a terminal RSS client.
is an elegant browser with built-in adblocking, tor and other features.
is a keyboard-driven browser.
is a browser for accessing the tor network
is a programme to configure X input devices. I mainly use this to turn off my keyboard
allows logging into captive portals.
is an emoji font.
allows accessing NTFS partitions.
is the audio system.
is an audio controller.
is a command-line audio interface.
is an Excel-like terminal spreadsheet manager.
can take quick screenshots at your request.
is an offline addressbook usable by neomutt.
hides an inactive mouse.
extracts rar's.
unzips zips.
gives the special escape/super mappings of LARBS.
allows for copying and pasting from the command line.
provides window action utilities on the command line.
aids with resolution determination and screen recording.
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.
is a pdf viewer with vim-like bindings.
allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura.
is a pdf viewer, which supports basic annotation features
manipulates .pdfs and gives .pdf previews and other .pdf functions.
shows audio and video information.
manages and gives information about archives.
is a fuzzy finder tool.
can highlight code output.
enables changing screen brightness levels.
routes all system traffic through tor. Installation requires the blackarch repos.
is a utility for finding the geolocation associated with an ip address
is a dependency of the citation.vim plugin
is a GUI literature management software. I am mainly using it to autocomplete citation information
provides syntax highlighting in the shell.
queues commands or files for download.
enables the mounting of cell phones.
is a graphical and colorful system monitor.
serves as the modular status bar.
runs commands and provides a UI for selection.
is my custom build of suckless's terminal emulator.
is the window manager.
is a light-weight terminal-based email system.
allows you to lock your computer, and quickly unlock with your password.
